tweet.text: Secretary of State Shultz (1982–89) understood Reagan’s inclination to work w/Soviet leadership to reduce the threat of nuclear weapons. Shultz’s pivotal role in U.S.-Soviet relations and arms control negotiations is documented in multiple #FRUS volumes: https://t.co/0femTIgOIw https://t.co/OYR0NwXLy1
